about_the_game:
Welcome to an entirely new planet to explore: Zormaghetti! Here you will need to put your skills to the test once again to defeat loads of new (and frankly, terrifying) creatures, as well as fight big, bad bosses, and push yourself to survive the harsh, alien landscapes!

Explore vast new regions and encounter all kinds of brand-new content, including an all-new game ending!

New Feature List:

  • 1 new game ending
  • 6 new achievements
  • 7 new alien regions
  • 40 new alien scenes
  • 16 new alien characters
  • 3 new alien bosses
  • 30 new alien creatures
  • 17 new alien wearable items
  • 14 new alien weapons
  • 3 new alien tools
  • 74 new other alien items
  • 1 new alien currency
